description: Destined to become a family favourite, this chicken parmigiana burger recipe is perfect for an easy midweek dinner.
name: Chicken Parmigiana Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g RSPCA approved chicken breast schnitzel

recipeInstructions.text: Spread bun bases with mayonnaise, then top with tomato, baby rocket leaves and chicken. Sandwich with bun tops and serve.
